portfolio.title: Titan Radio Live Music Player
portfolio.description: Made a music player that contains live music, DJ Info, Show Info, Bio info, timing, and progress bar. Plays 24/7 on my college's campus radio. Made together with Angel Armendariz at Titan Radio. Uses Javascript, HTML, and CSS.

portfolio.title: The Evolution of Sharks
portfolio.description: (WIP, Expected to be finished Mid Semester) Website that will be turned in for my Earth History Lab Final. Made with React.

portfolio.title: Password Generator
portfolio.description: Web application using JavaScript and React. Has buttons that create randomized passwords.

portfolio.title: Forum, Shop, & Checkout Cart
portfolio.description: Web application that allows users to create an account, login, shop, checkout, and logout. Created using PHP and MySQL

portfolio.title: Compiler
portfolio.description: Compiler on a terminal for a psuedo language called Rat22F. Includes a lexer and parser. Created with Python.

portfolio.title: Restaurant Roulette
portfolio.description: Web app that displays restaurant reviews & google map locations. Users can create, review, update, and delete recommendations.

portfolio.title: Alien-Invasion
portfolio.description: Play Alien Invasion. Created with Python
